name: Workona Dark Theme
additional_info: IMPORTANT NOTE: I won’t update this style on UserStyles.org, because the website is quite slow and most of the time I get 50x errors codes when loading the website. Please use the raw URL of the style and install it either via Stylus (in that case you can get updates) or manually. ------------------------------------ This is the first time I create and publish s user style. It definitely isn’t perfect, but it suits my needs (darken the theme to avoid blinding my eyes). Tested on Firefox only. If someone whats to contribute, feel free to raise an issue or create a merge/pull request at GitLab.com. ------------------------------------ Below is the changelog of the latest three versions. For changelog history, see changelog.md in GitLab repository. Release 1.0.2 [27 January 2021] - Fix version number in the CSS file ------------------------------------ Release 1.0.1 [27 January 2021] - Fix name of the user style (it must have .user.css extension) ------------------------------------ Release 1.0.0 [27 January 2021] - Darken elements in Shortcts section in Workona preferences - Fix checkmark colour in checkboxes in tab lists (it should be white) - Add UserCSS header - Rename user-style.css to workona_dark_theme.css - Remove version information from changelog.md - Update screenshots
